title: Mongo
description: Monitor mongo using logs and metrics.

metrics.description: The number of cache operations of the instance.
metrics.name: mongodb_cache_operations

metrics.description: The number of collections.
metrics.name: mongodb_collection_count

metrics.description: The size of the collection. Data compression does not affect this value.
metrics.name: mongodb_data_size

metrics.description: The number of connections.
metrics.name: mongodb_connection_count

metrics.description: The number of extents.
metrics.name: mongodb_extent_count

metrics.description: The time the global lock has been held.
metrics.name: mongodb_global_lock_time

metrics.description: The number of indexes.
metrics.name: mongodb_index_count

metrics.description: Sum of the space allocated to all indexes in the database, including free index space.
metrics.name: mongodb_index_size

metrics.description: The amount of memory used.
metrics.name: mongodb_memory_usage

metrics.description: The number of objects.
metrics.name: mongodb_object_count

metrics.description: The latency of operations.
metrics.name: mongodb_operation_latency_time

metrics.description: The number of operations executed.
metrics.name: mongodb_operation_count

metrics.description: The number of replicated operations executed.
metrics.name: mongodb_operation_repl_count

metrics.description: The total amount of storage allocated to this collection.
metrics.name: mongodb_storage_size

metrics.description: The number of existing databases.
metrics.name: mongodb_database_count

metrics.description: The number of times an index has been accessed.
metrics.name: mongodb_index_access_count

metrics.description: The number of document operations executed.
metrics.name: mongodb_document_operation_count

metrics.description: The number of bytes received.
metrics.name: mongodb_network_io_receive

metrics.description: The number of by transmitted.
metrics.name: mongodb_network_io_transmit

metrics.description: The number of requests received by the server.
metrics.name: mongodb_network_request_count

metrics.description: The total time spent performing operations.
metrics.name: mongodb_operation_time

metrics.description: The total number of active sessions.
metrics.name: mongodb_session_count

metrics.description: The number of open cursors maintained for clients.
metrics.name: mongodb_cursor_count

metrics.description: The number of cursors that have timed out.
metrics.name: mongodb_cursor_timeout_count

metrics.description: Number of times the lock was acquired in the specified mode.
metrics.name: mongodb_lock_acquire_count

metrics.description: Number of times the lock acquisitions encountered waits because the locks were held in a conflicting mode.
metrics.name: mongodb_lock_acquire_wait_count

metrics.description: Cumulative wait time for the lock acquisitions.
metrics.name: mongodb_lock_acquire_time

metrics.description: Number of times the lock acquisitions encountered deadlocks.
metrics.name: mongodb_lock_deadlock_count

metrics.description: The health status of the server.
metrics.name: mongodb_health

metrics.description: The amount of time that the server has been running.
metrics.name: mongodb_uptime
